thread.title: IND W vs SA live streaming, ICC Women's World Cup 2025: When and where to watch India vs South Africa match
thread.title_full: IND W vs SA live streaming, ICC Women's World Cup 2025: When and where to watch India vs South Africa match

author: Piyush Thapa
title: IND W vs SA live streaming, ICC Women's World Cup 2025: When and where to watch India vs South Africa match
text: IND W vs SA live streaming, ICC Women's World Cup 2025: India will look to continue their winning momentum when they face South Africa in the ICC Women's World Cup 2025 league fixture at the ACA-VDCA International Cricket Stadium in Visakhapatnam on Thursday. So far, the Women in Blue have won both their matches against Pakistan and Sri Lanka. However, big names like Smriti Mandhana, Harmanpreet Kaur and Jemimah Rodrigues are yet to shine with their bat in the tournament so far. They will look to make things happen their side in the clash against South Africa. Also Read | IND W vs SA W, Women's World Cup: India eye hefty contribution from top-order batters against South Africa Find the live streaming details of IND-W vs SA-W, Women's World Cup 2025 match: When is India Women vs South Africa Women, ICC Women's World Cup match? The India Women vs South Africa Women, ICC Women's World Cup match will be played on Thursday (October 9). Where is the India Women vs South Africa Women, ICC Women's World Cup match? The India Women vs South Africa Women, ICC Women's World Cup match will be played in Visakhapatnam. Sound On Feel the bliss of #TeamIndia Support the #WomenInBlue and get your tickets now: https://t.co/vGzkkgwXt4 #CWC25 | #INDvSA | @mandhana_smriti pic.twitter.com/dml5AP8ZPf â€” BCCI Women (@BCCIWomen) October 8, 2025 What time does the India Women vs South Africa Women, ICC Women's World Cup match start? The India Women vs South Africa Women, ICC Women's World Cup match will start at 3:00 pm IST. The toss will take place half an hour earlier than the scheduled start. Which TV channels will broadcast the India Women vs South Africa Women, ICC Women's World Cup match? The India Women vs South Africa Women, ICC Women's World Cup match will broadcast on Star Sports Network. Where can I catch the live streaming of the India Women vs South Africa Women, ICC Women's World Cup match? The live streaming of the India Women vs South Africa Women, ICC Women's World Cup match will be available on JioHotstar.",
